statements: DELETE FROM ClimateChangeData WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM ClimateChangeData WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 0.5;
DELETE FROM ClimateChangeData WHERE location = 'California' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM EcosystemData WHERE ecosystem_id = 3 AND temperature_tolerance < 25.0;
DELETE FROM analysis_results WHERE analysis_type = 'Temperature Analysis';
DELETE FROM research_team WHERE research_topic = 'Climate Change';
DELETE FROM ecosystem_impact WHERE location = 'Amazon Rainforest' AND impact_description LIKE '%deforestation%';
